title: Mary, Queen of the Apostles Novena
description: The title of Mary, Queen of the Apostles, is an ancient title of Our Lady in the Church. Pray this novena for consolation, more fruitful prayers, deeper conversion, and for an outpouring of the Holy Spirit.

startRule.text: Thursday of the Fifth Week of Easter

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

(mention request here‚Ä¶) O Mary, Queen of the Apostles, you who were present with the Apostles in prayer at Pentecost, intercede for us before your Son, that we may be filled with the gifts of the Holy Spirit. You who nurtured the early Church with your prayers and presence, help us to be faithful disciples of your Son, steadfast in prayer and united in love. Grant us the gift of faith like that of the Apostles, that we may boldly proclaim the Gospel to all nations, trusting in your intercession and guidance. O Mary, Queen of the Apostles, we entrust our prayers and petitions to your loving care, knowing that you intercede for us before your Son. May we follow your example in faith, hope, and love, and may we, like the Apostles, proclaim the Good News to all the world. Amen.

Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be Mary, Queen of the Apostles, pray for us.

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.
